Tutorial

Step 3: Belongs To

We’ll be adding the database table departments:

id name
1 Engineering
2 Safety
3 QA

We’ll also be adding a department_id:integer foreign key column to the positions table.

Update our seed file:

Make sure to update spec/factories/departments with randomized data. Then, since this is also a required relationship, update spec/factories/positions.rb to always seed a department when we ask to create a position:
